description:
Update a Mac Valgrind suppression after landing r35776.

BUG=31586
TEST=Mac Valgrind unit tests
TBR=jrg

Committed: http://src.chromium.org/viewvc/chrome?view=rev&revision=35789

messages.text:
On 2010/01/08 14:36:46, rsesek wrote:
> 

Why can't we remove this completely?  Specifically, why can't we remove the leak completely (e.g. destroy the obj when the TestingProfile gets deallocated)?

Becuase the URLRequestContextGetter has the DeleteOnIOThread RefCounted trait. It will leak until we give it a ChromeThread::IO to delete itself on, which we will do in http://codereview.chromium.org/527001/show.

Ah; excellent.  Comments like that are good to add to the CL description.

jrg


On Fri, Jan 8, 2010 at 10:06 AM, <rsesek@chromium.org> wrote:

> Becuase the URLRequestContextGetter has the DeleteOnIOThread RefCounted
> trait.
> It will leak until we give it a ChromeThread::IO to delete itself on, which
> we
> will do in http://codereview.chromium.org/527001/show.
>
>
> http://codereview.chromium.org/521076
>

subject: Update a Mac Valgrind suppression after landing r35776.
